intro.description: This cheat sheet is a step-by-step description of how to create a Project and Model to edit an instance of SIMAPA.

item.title: Create a General Project
item.description: We need a Project to work on a new SIMAPA Model. A "General" Project will suffice. Click "Play" to create a Project.

item.title: Create a SIMAPA Model
item.description: We must create a new SIMAPA Model. Click "Play" to create a SIMAPA Model.
